verbatim_quote: Judith Cline Chief Nursing OfficerEmail Judy×Judy ClineJudy Cline is the Chief Nursing Officer at Seneca Healthcare District.  As a registered nurse (RN), she previously worked at Enloe Medical Center in Chico for over 35 years. She has vast experience in critical care, trauma, emergency, and flight nursing.Judy stated, “I wanted to complete my nursing career doing something meaningful for the community where we plan to retire, and to be a part of the new Seneca Hospital planning and build has been nothing short of amazing! It is going to be a beautiful, state-of-the-art, and modern hospital that will serve our community very well for many years to come.” Close
